Ok, so let's look at the character guide so far:

Tevildo - Mage AKA The wizard of the book for the good guys. Protagonist of story, 5"10, brown hair, facial beard. Uses quarterstaff, magic. In the group to thwart Jakarta.

Hightower - Barbarian AKA Big Tuff Guy. 6"8, black hair in warrior pony tail, cleanshaven. Uses a large maul. In the group to fight people. 

Bjorn - Thief AKA Sir Sneaks Alot. 5"9, black hair, commoner's clothes, uses a long or short sword (havent decided). Yearns to be group leader. In the group to get money.

Trahern/Zjackrum - Elf. 5"5, gray hair, facial paint of some elf clan. Wears forest clothing, uses the mantray (special elf sword). Very agreeable and playful. In the group for the adventure.

Owahn Khaat - Saervii guy in charge of recruitment.

Deathifier - Cleric. 5"10, blond hair (like the guy in glad) uses priest magic. Red robes of the God Ricket :D no weapon as of yet. Will join the group later on.

Triad/Oldschool - Archer. You need to be something more though... Got any other weapon choice? Character description? Attitude? Why are you in the group?

Rory - Assassin. Ok... I assume you work for the Saervii too... Might stick you on the bad guy team if I can't fit you in... Now, as amazing as you want to be, if you're an assassin, you can't use magic. Sorry, just not happenin. Same thing with Triad, need a bit of character info.

Dancing Corpse - You'd definately be on the bad guy's team as some kind of undead creature. Maybe like Morduno from Last Blade 1 (its a street fighter clone arcade game) I think I'm pretty much on my own for making up stuff about this char... Definately going to be awhile before I bring you into the story.

The guy we meet at the start of Chapter 3 is Shifter, he works for Jakarta. Still need a couple of names for character I'm planning on making. Bonus points if you dont mind dying, since people always need to die.

And to Rory: Forgotten Realms made Baldur's gate, and using two weapons is strangely Drizzt like. He's a character in the books and the game.

-Trahern/Zjackrum
